transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Haan, kaun?
Executive: Mr. Mihir baat kar rahe hain?
Customer: Ji, bataiye.
Executive: Main Suresh baat karta, Business Manager IndiaMART se.
Customer: Ji, boliye.
Executive: Aapke services ke regarding ek feedback aaya tha. Jaise aapki call pe baat hui hogi Vansh Tomar ke saath, right?
Customer: Ji, ji, right.
Executive: Toh aapne unko negative feedback diya hai. So kya unke saath discussion aapka sahi nahi tha tab? Ya woh cheeze samjha nahi paaye aapko?
Customer: Nahi, nahi, aisa kuch nahi hai. Actually, uh, maine, uh, mujhe woh samajh mein nahi aaya ki woh kisi ek specific person ke liye tha. Maine in general overall IndiaMART ke experience ke liye not satisfactory, uh, uss pe woh diya tha.
Executive: Chaliye, theek hai. Fir bhi aapne IndiaMART ko not satisfied, aapne, aap do cheez bol rahe hain, theek hai. Waise kyun not satisfied hain sir aap IndiaMART se? Issue kya hai?
Customer: Kyunki, uh, jab maine IndiaMART liya tha, tab mere paas matlab, uh, jinse bhi meri baat hui thi, ki sir, hamare yeh clients hain, unko itna business mil raha hai, inko itne relevant leads mil rahe hain, yeh woh.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Mere paas kuch bhi nahi ho raha.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Matlab, I have not done any business after I have taken this IndiaMART subscription aur koi relevant leads nahi aati hain. Uh, itni aapki categories mein itni problem hai mapping mein. Matlab, uh, main AC drives, jo industrial drives hoti hain, unme deal karta hun. Maine woh category map kari hai toh log mujhse AC ke remote ke liye baat kar rahe hain.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Abhi aap samajh rahe hain level of, uh, this error iss case mein?
Executive: Samajh raha hun, main samajh raha hun.
Customer: That's why I am not at all satisfied. Aur jinse meri baat hui hai, unse mujhe koi problem nahi hai. Woh kuch bol rahe the ki we'll look into it and this and that. So that's okay. I am, isme main jo issue aata hai na, main aapko batata hun thoda sa. Portal is working on behavior pe. Aap first time IndiaMART pe hain toh aapko AI behavior thoda sa toh aap waise jaante honge but yeh jo work karta hai, waisa hi karta hai. Maan lijiye aapko ek mahine koi cheez kharab aa rahi hai, hai na? Aur aapne woh cheeze initially ek do mahine mein agar aapne khud se matlab account manager jo yahan pe baithe hote hain, agar unke paas possibility nahi hai toh he'll have the team. Tactic, technical team hai unke paas, other teams hain jo unke saath baith ke aapke catalog overall review kar legi ek time mein. Half an, aadhe ghante bhi lag jaaye chahe usme, theek hai? But woh ek baar review ho jaata hai then and there aapke paas sirf jo problems specially aa rahi thi woh resolve ho jaati hain.
Customer: Nahi, but yeh jo catalog, yeh jo catalog wala time aap bol rahe hain, this I have already given a lot of times. Uh, in the beginning itself. Kam se kam aapke jo bhi, aapke jo bhi, uh, yeh person hote hain jo yeh banane mein jinka kaam hota hai ki catalog banana hai. Jinse maine catalog banwaya, unko saari information deke unhone sab gadbad kar diya. Maine khud ne baith ke yeh pura catalog banaya hai uske baad. Matlab ek ek cheez maine fill kari hai. Uske baad aur baith ke maine saari cheeze review karwa di. Video call pe unhone bola ki sir aapko isi tarike se karna hota hai. Saari cheeze karne ke baad bhi there is no result. Toh abhi mera maanna toh yeh hai ki I am not interested in this anymore. Jaisa bhi hai abhi ek saal ka subscription hai. It's going to be there on the internet. Hamara catalog and I am okay with it. Uh, IndiaMART.
Executive: Theek hai. But fir bhi maine abhi Vansh ko review karke ek suggestion diya tha ki aapke saath ya aap hi kisi bhi team member ke saath, right? Nahi, matlab, ki hamari, hamari team nahi hai. We are very new like it's only, it's been only three or four years since we started. Hamare paas team nahi hai and we don't have the time, uh, apne aap mein ki hum baith ke yahi cheez karein. So that is why I am not able to, only need to discuss the category mapping and active location. Bas yeh do cheez discuss karni thi. Jo ki proper aapko pata hoti hai. Ki hum aapke woh category mapping kar rakhi hai. Matlab jaise aapke paas do options hote hain category map karne ke. I have already, uh, made both of those. Matlab woh dono cheeze added hain wahan pe. Toh aapko single category ki particular jab aap portal open karte hain, ek bhi lead show nahi karti hai aapko?
Customer: Nahi, mere ko koi relevant leads nahi mil rahi hain. Matlab, aap dekh sakte hain na mera login aap dekh sakte hain pichle mahine mein kitni baar, kam se kam, kam se kam 15 baar toh kiya hoga. 50% toh hai mera monthly login.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Right? Us 50% mein have you seen me consuming leads? Matlab bahut rarely aisa hota hai ki main koi lead consume kar leta hun. Kyunki kuch, kuch business nahi mil raha hai toh I go with something that is matlab not exactly relevant but aas paas ka bhi hota hai toh I just try to, you know, talk to the client.
Executive: Hmm hmm, main samajh raha hun. Otherwise, almost aapke paas 70, 74 categories hain jisme hum deal kar rahe hain, theek hai? Toh yeh bahut zyada hai, theek hai? Main in 74 categories mein itna specific karna cha raha hun, in 74 ko main convert karke cha raha hun jo aapke top ke hot selling categories hain, theek hai? Isme already dekhiye aap VFD mein kaam kar rahe hain, theek hai? PLC panels mein kaam karte hain, PLC panels mein kaam kar rahe hain, theek hai? VFD panels mein kaam kar rahe hain aap. Yeh saare product aapko pata hoga IndiaMART pe bahut competitive hain.
Customer: Right.
Executive: Right. So, haan, definitely bahut competitive hain and there are suppliers yahan pe aise bhi hain jo ki, uh, kaafi achi services mein leke baithe hue hain woh. But woh abhi, isme kya hai ki jaise aap bol rahe hain nayi category mapping, yeh 74 se I can reduce it down to 20, uh, 20 categories. I can do that. Lekin mujhe pichli baar kisi ne suggest kiya tha ki aap har ek product ki jitni zyada categories daal sakte hain usme daal dijiye. Aap product dijiye. Woh bhi ek acha suggestion hai. Sirf woh aapko fir utna active rehna padta hai. Haan, woh VFD ke andar VFD bhi aata hai, ABB VFD bhi aata hai, Siemens VFD bhi aata hai. Sir aapne saara brand bhi daal diya isme. Aapne bhi daal diya, Siemens bhi daal diya aapne, hai na? Kyunki yeh saari cheeze mujhe pehle boli gayi thi ki aap jitne product aap, uh, jitna segregation rakh paao that is, uh, going to be helpful. Baki ab agar aap bol rahe hain ki categories bahut zyada hain, I can, ya toh dekho sir abhi kya hai na, abhi main agar aapko bolun, agar maine aapka portal login kiya, theek hai? Toh sir aap lead bhi jo aapne ab tak consume ki, theek hai? Hardly chaar lead sabse zyada consume ki woh temperature thermo couple mein aapne, thermo couple mein. Right? Haan. Ya, yeh category mein aapne lead zyada consume ki hain. Kyunki isme aapko avail ho gayi hogi aasani se isliye aapne consume kar li. Lekin main abhi aapko bolun ki aapka VFD ek category hai, isme aapne ek bhi lead consume nahi ki, theek hai? Toh woh reason itna hai ya toh leads aapke paas aane se pehle sold out ho ja rahi hain. Jaise agar main check karun, mere paas S121 series, theek hai? Solar pump VFD, theek hai? Rangareddy, Telangana se paanch piece pada hua hai. Ab yeh aapke relevant hai, solar pump controller hai yeh like ek. Ab yeh agar aapke relevant hai toh sir aapko pata hoga, yeh cheez review karni hai. Jab aap portal kholte hain na, toh aapko ek bhi, jaise main aapka normal portal khol raha hun toh main jaise by leads pe ja raha hun, mujhe ek bhi lead dikhaai nahi de rahi mujhe. But when I go to search option, kyunki portal behavior bhool gaya aapka. Usko nahi pata ki abhi aapka VFD important hai ya aapka thermocol important hai, kya hai? Kyunki saara aapka inactive pada hai category. Lekin maine jab aapka VFD search kiya abhi, toh mere ko yeh lead nikal ke aayi saamne se. Rangareddy ki maine aapko suggest ki abhi. Toh yeh thoda sa mandatory hai sir. Hum aapko by leads 17, yeh nahi dete hain ki aap 17 ka 17 kar sakta hun. Zyada stress nahi lena hota. Aapko bas aapke jo top ke selling categories hoti hain na, uss par weekly wise lead consumption hai. Woh main aapko thoda sa guide karunga. Woh work kaise karta hai, theek hai? Toh aap uske liye ya toh aap mujhe ek short si meeting de do aap apne comfortable time ke hisaab se. Hardly takes 10 to 15 minutes. Aap jab bhi bologe, I'll be there with Vansh, theek hai? Toh main aapko connect kar lunga. Vansh bhi rahega saath mein. Taaki usko bhi ek idea lag jaayega ki aapke product ki jo demand hai, particular uss location pe jahan se aap maang rahe ho, wahan pe competition level kitna hai aur main aapko kya drive karke de sakta hun iss services mein. Theek hai. Toh hum yeh shaam ko kar sakte hain like 4:30, 5:00 baje ke aas paas. Done? Done. Theek hai? Theek hai. Main bol deta hun Vansh ko, woh schedule kar deta hai 4:30 ka. Bilkul, theek hai. Thank you, thank you. Okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Dissatisfied with IndiaMART experience overall.

- No relevant leads after subscription.

- Category mapping issues; irrelevant inquiries.

- Catalog creation issues despite providing information.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how the portal works.

- Executive offered a meeting to discuss category mapping.

- Executive offered to guide on lead consumption.



Next Steps: 

- Meeting scheduled for the evening at 4:30-5:00 PM.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, category mapping, catalog, vfd
